name: Ward 17
description:
Traverse through the haunted halls of Ward 17 and beyond, dark forces are afoot throughout this cursed hospital, the question is, can you escape? 

Ward 17 is a game developed solely by K Simpson (Myself) and is a short first person pixel styled, Puzzle/Adventure Horror Game, with two different possible endings...

Controls: 

W,A,S,D to move

Space bar to Jump over obstacles

R to Restart Level

Escape to Quit Game

Walk over items/notes/keys to interact in game

Game Engine - Unreal Engine 4

Development Background Info:

This game was developed from concept in 6 days, after the surprising hit - Remorse of Revelations, a game developed in approx 3 days by myself (as a solo game jam entry into the UE4 Spring Jam 2020), this game is an update on that similar concept, and expands on similar gameplay mechanics derived from that game, with improved lighting, texture detail and environment variety...
